column1: I’m honored to have been selected as a conferee for #NDAAFY21 by @GOPLeader.   I will continue to fight to make this NDAA one that modernizes our armed forces maintains our competitive edge and gives our service members and their families the resources they deserve.
Incredible news! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/lGEpSyqeuS

I supported Kevin McCarthy for @GOPLeader. He has proved a trusted capable leader for House Republicans.  I was also proud to support @SteveScalise for Whip and @RepLizCheney for Conference Chair.   I have total confidence they will keep pushing our conference forward! https://t.co/t6C8FbK9Kr

This #VeteransDay we honor the heroes who put everything on the line for America.  Join me in saying “thank you” to all those who have served in the military and to their families who have shared in their sacrifice.  May God bless our veterans their families and our nation. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/Yjo9GGr4HB

This is encouraging news! If the FDA is able to approve a vaccine Dr. Randall Williams Director of the Missouri Department of Health and Human Services says Missouri could have it within 4-5 weeks. https://t.co/vO1Tx991Ie

🚨 Great October jobs report! 🚨   @USDOL reports 638000 new jobs last month beating the 530000 economists expected.  Unemployment rate falls to 6.9% also beating expectations.   Labor force participation rate rose 0.3 points to 61.7%.  America is bouncing back! https://t.co/DKKow3olDg

I join @realDonaldTrump in recognizing November as National Adoption Month!    Adoption is a great way God can make a family. Every child is a blessing and I pray every child has an opportunity to be part of a loving family.  https://t.co/ujU7ITtFhu

The economic reports today outpace the projections. America’s economy is roaring back!   We are fighting to ensure businesses stay open and America’s families are getting back to work.  We will defeat and overcome this virus! 🇺🇸   https://t.co/EwLrgC8uKy
Confirmed.
Today’s the day. From Judge to Justice Amy Coney Barrett has earned her seat at the table. #ConfirmACB
I am unapologetically pro-life.   I'm proud that our president and this administration are too. https://t.co/zAYm4Do94w

It was great to join @PYNance and the @CWforA in Missouri today in support of Judge Amy Coney Barrett’s nomination to the Supreme Court.  Judge Barrett has earned her seat at the table and will make an incredible Justice.   #WomenForAmy https://t.co/rkVSm0JmLC

I joined my colleagues in asking FCC Chairman @AjitPaiFCC important questions on Twitter's actions against the NY Post.  If Twitter is found to have violated federal regulations and suppressing journalists before an election it will have done great harm to our democracy. https://t.co/Ao3WKll8s7

I'm honored to have been named a Guardian of Small Business by @NFIB!   America's small businesses and entrepreneurs are the engine that drives our economy and helps move our communities forward.  Thank you for the recognition! #SmallBizGuardian https://t.co/rV32V0iIeh

My colleague @RepRubenGallego and I are proposing a Digital Marshall Plan to help curb technological influences #China and the #CCP have around the world.   Central to our bipartisan plan is helping our @NATO allies by securing European 5G networks:  https://t.co/6lzHyxqHMr

Congratulations to the @USNavy on 245 years of dutiful service to our land our people our freedoms and our values.   May God bless all who have served who are currently serving and all the Navy spouses and families for their commitment and sacrifice to our nation. https://t.co/z1fitPxUcd
Powerful. 🔥   Senate Judiciary Chairman Lindsey Graham is absolutely correct. Amy Coney Barrett will soon have a well-deserved seat at the table. #ConfirmACB    https://t.co/E3G9oJHxi2

The government should NEVER impose substantial burden on exercising our religious freedoms. Our 1A rights are what makes our great nation uniquely American.  A great decision and great victory for Capitol Hill Baptist Church: https://t.co/ukhbwVoUhj

🔥🔥🔥  This from Amy Coney Barrett’s opening testimony so perfectly encapsulates the proper constitutional role of Supreme Court Justices.  At a time when too many legislate from the bench ACB knows fundamentally what her role on the Court will be.  https://t.co/hZ71nM61F5

“A judge must apply the law as it is written not as she wishes it were.”  Amy Coney Barrett understands the role of our Courts isn’t to rewrite the work of the people’s representatives but rather to be a shrewd protector of our constitution.  It’s time #ConfirmACB

So awesome! I’m incredibly proud of @MizzouFootball’s win over LSU today!   Real winners never let adversity stand in the way. Let’s keep the momentum going @CoachDrinkwitz! 🐯 🏈 https://t.co/EuOFPaQKlh
This is excellent news! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/w0Tj592kwp

We must bring America back to its core principles of loving our neighbors protecting life and cherishing liberty so the next generation can continue writing the greatest social and political experiment in history — the American story.  That's our #CommitmentToAmerica. https://t.co/6zg2V4iNNB

America never hides in fear in the face of social and political turbulence. Instead America always rises safer stronger and freer.   Law and order must be restored. That’s the American way and I vow to fight for it always. #CommitmentToAmerica  https://t.co/1197nVtox6

We need people on the Supreme Court who will respect the work of the people’s representatives not Justices who will legislate from the bench.   Policy debates should happen in Congress NOT the Supreme Court. #ConfirmACB
The President has the duty to nominate the Senate to offer advice and consent. It’s that simple.  We must #ConfirmACB without delay.

I applaud the move this past weekend by @realDonaldTrump to help #EndInfanticide.  All newborn babies have the right to proper medical care. Any child who is #BornAlive even after an attempted abortion deserves this basic protection.  https://t.co/YGPxsUyErZ

I applaud @realDonaldTrump’s Supreme Court pick to #FillTheSeat!  As the President said Amy Coney Barrett is a woman of unparalleled achievement and towering intellect. She is immensely qualified and I look forward to the Senate’s confirmation hearing.  https://t.co/zHgWIhpOUP

I thank @RoyBlunt and @SenHawleyPress for standing on the side of the Constitution and for their commitment to ensuring the Senate will #FillTheSeat with a qualified textual originalist nominee.  I look forward to having a confirmation without delay. #CommitmentToAmerica https://t.co/BobSzEmbZ1
@jaketapper @RepMcGovern @RepChrisSmith Thank you for highlighting this Jake.

I am proud of this committee's work. We must do everything possible to hold #China and the #CCP accountable for their treatment of the #Uyghurs.  Condemnation is fine but it's time for action.   I thank all my House colleagues for coming together on this important legislation. https://t.co/rW3k0ROOvU

I'm voting for restrictions and sanctions to crack down on the #CCP's forced labor camps.   Products from #Xinjiang using forced labor from #Uyghur populations have NO PLACE in the United States.  It's time we stop this #UyghurGenocide. #China MUST be held accountable for this.

GOOD NEWS!   Today the Department of Interior confirmed my request to honor George Washington Carver at the National Garden of American Heroes was included in the list sent to @realDonaldTrump.  His contributions to our national history should be preserved and celebrated. https://t.co/TRC4kvUTzf https://t.co/sQLU9xsWlA

We stood on the Capitol steps to lay out our #CommitmentToAmerica. Part of the commitment is restoring order in our communities.  That's why we're proposing increasing funds by $1.7 billion to improve police training and provide more equipment including 500000+ body cameras. https://t.co/n4rk4TvjHe
@PStieple My heartfelt condolences are with you and your family.

Our #CommitmentToAmerica is to protect the fundamental principles that keep our communities safe.   I condemn ALL who hijack a legitimate national conversation and use it as an excuse to loot destroy and kill. Their actions are reprehensible and have no place in our nation. https://t.co/AI4kHXSDfS

My colleagues and I are making a #CommitmentToAmerica keeping our communities safe from riots and violence.  I’ll discuss my support for the David Dorn Act which will crack down on those who incite participate and organize riots.   WATCH HERE: https://t.co/Q27ULhqMRH https://t.co/kV1OJUDDJB

Bahrain and UAE have normalized relations with Israel after agreements brokered by @realDonaldTrump and his Administration.   Their partnership will prove vital in countering extremism in the Middle East and containing Iran's influence.   Peace and stability should be celebrated! https://t.co/xvpvgLIXaV

Calling a step towards peace and stability in the Middle East "a distraction..."  Speaker Pelosi and House Democrats should be working together with @POTUS and his team to advance U.S. interests abroad.  Election time political calculations shouldn't hinder our foreign policy. https://t.co/m992J9ewGX

Peace is a beautiful and needed thing. @realDonaldTrump and his administration have proven capable of ushering in #ANewEra of peace and stability in the Middle East.  Both the United Arab Emirates and Bahrain will serve as important partners to counter terrorism and extremism. https://t.co/75mFNl44a2

|Today we honor the victims and heroes we lost.   Terrorists believed they could attack the soul of our nation that America would cower and retreat.   Instead we stood taller stronger and more united in resistance to evil.  God bless America.  #NeverForget || #NeverForget911 https://t.co/2FmqoPNLA7|
#NFL is back. I'm so excited for our Kansas City Chiefs' opening night as our world champions start the long journey to back-to-back Super Bowls!   Go @Chiefs! #ChiefsKingdom

|Every 13 minutes we lose a person to the 10th biggest killer in America. Veterans are among most impacted communities by this heartbreaking reality.  Thank you @ASP for highlighting this important issue.  1-800-273-8255 || #WorldSuicidePreventionDay  https://t.co/NtiNEYaIqQ|

Today is World Suicide Prevention Day. Far too many suffer from mental illnesses that lead to heartbreaking and excruciating events.   In a moment of crisis there are important resources to help those in need and can help you save a life:  1-800-273-8255 https://t.co/V6omfNtGz1

Our economic rebound is headed in the right direction as unemployment falls to 8.4% and 1.37 million new jobs are created.  My @HouseGOP colleagues and I are committed to ensuring our economy heals from this pandemic and Americans' lives are restored!  https://t.co/mf0p6MB33X

Operation Warp Speed is in full effect to provide a safe and effective COVID-19 vaccine!  I agree with CDC Director Robert Redfield. We MUST ensure red tape doesn't stop this needed vaccine from getting to the American people.   America will win this battle on coronavirus. https://t.co/ZgA0stNfCW

I will NEVER support to "defund the police."  I signed the #PolicePledge to oppose any bill taking away critical resources from our law enforcement officials.  Our police officers deserve our support and our respect for keeping our communities safe from mob rule.

I'm requesting that George Washington Carver be included in the National Garden of American Heroes.  His contributions to our national history as a revolutionary in agriculture and an inspiration for Americans in every community should be preserved and celebrated. https://t.co/MJHJ5JsSzw
ALL children both born and unborn have a precious and God-given right to life. It is the most basic and fundamental right!

We must give our law enforcement the tools resources and support they need to restore law and order in our communities.   Looting rioting and killing has never been the American way.   We need more people in our country like David Dorn. His death should have never happened. https://t.co/OuPZDHuC8A

From taking on #China to negotiating the #USMCA American trade is better because of @realDonaldTrump.   Together with leadership from @HouseGOP and @SenateGOP we will continue to ensure our trade deals work for ALL Americans! 🇺🇸

My prayers are with the brave Missourians serving Missouri Task Force 1.   They are deploying to help response efforts as Hurricane Laura makes landfall. Their selfless commitment to helping their communities and their country is admirable. #MOTF1 https://t.co/652rQ7Sgls

It’s so disappointing to see the @NCAA Division I canceled this year.   As a former track coach I know the importance sports play in students’ lives. Many have built their entire lives around this ambition and it’s sad to see it taken away.  https://t.co/G0KrXtVPs1

Today @SecPompeo called Confucius Institutes an entity "advancing Beijing’s global propaganda & malign influence campaign on U.S. campuses”  He's right.   They are #CCP soft power tools to advance #China's world power agenda and no place in the American education system.

Fantastic news for the #Israel the UAE and the whole Middle East. Peace and stability in the Middle East is a key strategic interest of the United States.  I applaud @realDonaldTrump his administration the negotiators and all who came to the table to make this happen. https://t.co/ZlNV98752t

We cannot afford the progressives' efforts to destroy defund and dismantle.  @HouseGOP is committed to rebuilding our economy reopening safely and responsibly and restoring law and order in our communities.  The soul of our nation depends on it.  https://t.co/flx17aOAGu

Empty threats from #China’s #CCP will never deter my colleagues and I from supporting democracy in #HongKong  Arresting pro-democracy advocates like #JimmyLai violates human rights and exemplifies China’s deliberate authoritarian push.  China must STOP attacking democracy.

Nice to see New York finally admit what we know knew all along in Missouri...  Of course it came *after* we were insulted by the pundits.  Keeping students out of schools is detrimental. America should never cower in fear. We rise up to the challenge. #RenewRestoreRebuild https://t.co/pnXvjCh94S

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for taking this important step!  I'm going to keep fighting to secure our supply chain of essential pharmaceuticals and medical supplies from #China. lt's time we free ourselves from the #CCP's stranglehold. #RenewRestoreRebuild  https://t.co/OBwUNfj4my

We must renew restore and rebuild our country in the face of the COVID-19 pandemic.  I'm continuing to fight for the deployment of #ruralbroadband reopening our communities safely and responsibly and protecting our economy from #China.   America's best days are still ahead.

No.  Communism never leads to a better future. It only leads to a path of deception corruption poverty and death.  The #CCP are holding the people of #China hostage as they commit atrocious crimes against humanity.   China is not the future. https://t.co/4fPlPk6U52

Congratulations @MariaBartiromo for 25 years of incredible journalism on econ/fin institutions.   Thanks for discussing with me important issues like protecting our military's pharmaceutical supply chain from #China/#CCP manipulation.  You are one of the industry's best! https://t.co/YNcBboDPg1

Today is the 230th Birthday of the U.S. Coast Guard!   Established in 1790 the @USCG does a phenomenal job patrolling our coastlines ensuring that narcotics are kept out of our communities and saving lives through critical rescue missions.  "Semper Paratus" is our guide! https://t.co/XGzQqmjhFN

My amendment to the bipartisan appropriations package provides $5 million to @DeptofDefense to leverage the resilience expertise of community-based non-profits for mental health treatment.  Those suffering from #PTSD and other mental illnesses deserve to have these tools. https://t.co/Wdw0QJd5Vb

I just wrapped up a call with @DHS_Wolf on efforts to protect the federal courthouse in #Portland from destruction.  245 officers have been injured. Mobs have attacked with weapons for 60 straight nights.   Nothing about this is "peaceful protesting." Order must be restored NOW!

This is worth the watch!  The brave men and women who serve and protect our communities deserve respect for their service.   Those who abuse their public trust should be held accountable but we must acknowledge they do not represent the good 99%. #BackTheBlue #ThinBlueLine https://t.co/3qGUX9CQvG

I also want to thank and applaud my friends in the Senate for introducing this companion bill with @SenTedCruz to protect Americans from spies tied to #China and other foe regimes:  @SenRubioPress  @SenThomTillis @SenatorLoeffler https://t.co/g6uZF3DsvZ

These patriots are joining me to protect the U.S. from spies from #China and other malign actors:  @RepGallagher @RepMattGaetz @MichaelBurgess @RepMikeRogersAL @CongBillPosey @RepGosar @RepScottPerry @RepMullin @RepRossSpano @RepRonWright @RepLaMalfa @RepBradWenstrup @RepGrothman https://t.co/g6uZF3DsvZ

I'm teaming up with @TedCruz on the Protecting America from Spies Act to stop spies affiliated with malign foreign regimes like the #CCP from coming back into the United States.  It's time we stop letting #China exploit our own laws.  Write up from @DCExaminer's @JerryDunleavy: https://t.co/mEUiML4j64

Nothing about burning buildings looted stores and damaging people's belongings is "peaceful." @Jim_Jordan is absolutely right to point this out.  Violence and madness have gone on for too long in many of our big cities claiming the lives of countless Americans. This must stop. https://t.co/iSVsS1sMbv

It is great to see @Chewy expand into Belton MO! This will create over 1200 new jobs and spur more opportunities for the city and is a huge gain for Cass County.   It’s no coincidence that businesses are choosing to move or expand into Missouri. Welcome to #MO04 Chewy! https://t.co/sUkwXa1RK4

The House sent a strong message to our brave men and women in uniform by delivering on an #NDAA putting them first.  The bill isn't perfect and I do not agree with every provision but I'm hopeful we can fix problematic provisions when we  negotiate with the Senate.

It's great to see several Dems join with Republicans to sink this disastrous amendment to defund our military.  These efforts to engage in political hackery at the expense of our national security deserve to fail miserably.  Let's keep backing up our men and women in uniform.

Today let's send a strong message of support for the commendable bravery and heroism our men and women in uniform.   Let's make sure they know that we have their backs by fighting for an #NDAA that makes them stronger and keeps them safer.  They've earned it.

I REJECT allowing partisan hackery to hamstring our national security.   The House Armed Services Committee this #NDAA with bipartisan support. Instead progressives want to undo it with $73 billion cuts to our military.  This dangerous and reckless amendment MUST be defeated. https://t.co/APyIWYWMqp

I support the #FY21NDAA that came out of committee with overwhelming bipartisan support.  But these proposed amendments playing politics with our national security are incredibly disheartening. We can't allow this legislation to be hijacked by a progressive wishlist. https://t.co/fEd3llZiOq

Activist judges blocked safety standards for women having chemical abortions.   These dangerous drugs can now be sent by mail without the need to go to a healthcare facility. This puts mothers at an extraordinary risk of death.  AG Barr we must appeal ACOG v FDA. #ProLife

Students must return to the classroom this fall.   I encourage teachers students and parents to follow local guidelines and reflect on the importance of education in the lives of our students. It is time for class to be back in session and our students to be put first. https://t.co/Wm5w7zsQyC

My latest on Fox News: @realDonaldTrump is right to act against #China for its inhumane crimes against the Uighurs  The US and the international community can't turn a blind eye to these atrocities. History will be our judge and should be our teacher.  https://t.co/vouk8iSAbX

Robert Courtney is an evil man responsible for countless lives. Diluting medications vital for cancer treatment is disgusting and he should face his full sentence.  Simply put: releasing Robert Courtney is the wrong move. This needs to be reversed. https://t.co/P4GjNB5XLz

Great move by the @USAirForce to invest in @BoeingDefense #F15EX! This program advances aircraft capabilities to handle a wide array of threats.   As part of the #NDAA I led efforts to keep funding for this program. I’m proud the F-15EX will be made right here in Missouri! https://t.co/G34xnilq57

Today @ASP goes live bringing lawmakers and the broader public together on new and exciting civil service projects. I'm glad to be a part!  @ChrisEvans sat down with me earlier this year to discuss the importance of faith-based groups in treating people suffering from #PTSD. https://t.co/2ZwMPyIhv7

#Huawei is a #China-controlled telecoms company accused by U.S. officials of intellectual property theft. Their reckless quest for digital authoritarianism is dangerous.  It’s refreshing to see the #UK an incredibly important ally take this bold action. I applaud @BorisJohnson. https://t.co/ErRSPLN3tC

China sanctioned me today.   It's because I'm on the forefront of exposing the cruel treatment the #CCP has imposed on the #Uyghurs.   No sanctions by Chinese communists will stop the work my #CECC colleagues and I are doing to expose these atrocities.   We won't back down.

As a mother and a former teacher I know firsthand students rely on their schools for sense of purpose vital nutrition and a place of stability. That is something worth fighting to protect. It’s time for students to return to the classroom.  https://t.co/XxQg3jFSYb

This was the right decision by @realDonaldTrump. The WHO's handling of the coronavirus was a total blunder covering for #China and the #CCP.  This is just the latest controversy having aggressively promoted abortion using organizational funds (much coming from U.S. taxpayers). https://t.co/zx1vaESXb5

Today we celebrate America and rejoice in how blessed we are to be Americans.   Let’s take time to thank God for the blessings He has given us to ask Him for forgiveness for our sins and to heal our land from any divisiveness and struggle we may face. Happy #IndependenceDay 🇺🇸 https://t.co/ctG5b7WQAb

We must reduce our dependency on #China for our pharmaceutical supply chain especially for our servicemembers. @RepGaramendi and I championed this effort and got it into the House version of the #NDAA.  Thank you @NikkiHaley and @StandAmericaNow for highlighting this issue. https://t.co/AoYUEZSJl9

🚨 4.8 million jobs added 🚨   Critical programs passed through the CARES Act such as the #PaycheckProtectionProgram are WORKING for hardworking Americans.  Protecting employees has been the priority of this Congress and the results are showing. Let’s keep working. https://t.co/0quHHRzG71

Still going strong at @HASCRepublicans markup of the National Defense Authorization Act.  Keeping America’s competitive advantage is critically important to safeguard our national security interests this #NDAA including the lives and mission of our servicemembers. #FY21NDAA https://t.co/tglBTyzqNa

Today we unanimously passed the #HongKong Autonomy Act. This is a strong show of support for the freedom fighters from #China's authoritarian grab.  But we need more than just resolutions from Washington. We need actual policy solutions to curb the #CCP's global recklessness.

In the case of COVID-19 the world is paying for the #CCP's dishonesty with thousands of lost lives and economic devastation. Now is the time to come together and take action to protect America from the communists in #China.  My latest in @TheHill: https://t.co/aB2TLh5ZWg

Great news! The #USMCA goes into full effect today.  This transcontinental agreement brings a needed boost to U.S. manufacturing and takes our relationships with Mexico and Canada into the 21st century.  Thank you @realDonaldTrump and @USTradeRep Lighthizer for your hard work! 🇺🇸

The #RussiaBounty reports are extremely troubling.   #Russia is a geopolitical enemy. We need all the information including the scope of Russia's anti-American operations in #Afghanistan to protect our armed forces from our enemies.   From @BryanLowry3: https://t.co/o5XnvGyO3d

We've allowed our competitive advantage to erode as #China and #Russia exploit what they see as U.S. vulnerabilities.   One thing is clear: we must reframe our national security perspective and modernize our forces in the era of great power competition.  https://t.co/yOMFGW7CIt

This week is the 48th anniversary of Title IX ensuring equal opportunities for girls and women to play sports. I had the privilege of coaching a girls’ track team and saw firsthand the positive impact sports have in a girl’s life.  Title IX must be protected to #SaveGirlsSports. https://t.co/CnJ2pNWSI9

Police reform doesn't have to be anti-police. We can encourage positive policing without hamstringing our police's ability to do their job. The #JUSTICEAct shows that.  But Sen. Schumer walks away and Speaker Pelosi says that GOP is trying to get away with murder. It's sickening.

Congress can't have an honest debate on police reform if one side just gets up and walks away. @SenatorTimScott deserves better for his efforts on the #JUSTICEAct.  I urge @SpeakerPelosi to reject Sen. Schumer's divisive approach and give the bill a fair vote here in the House. https://t.co/mwYqWmCPDK

Demoralizing really.   Senator Schumer had the chance to find common ground with Republicans on police reform. Instead they just walked out and looks like Speaker Pelosi is going to do the same in the House.  The #JUSTICEAct deserves thoughtful consideration and a fair vote. https://t.co/rPx8PXDLHU

Reprehensible. @SpeakerPelosi should apologize.  It’s one thing to have fundamental policy disagreements. It’s another to accuse someone of trying to get away with murder. I know Americans are not as divided as our politics suggest. Do better. https://t.co/kCKFSnbzeJ

Fantastic idea @AjitPaiFCC. Huge impact for our veterans in particular.   Nearly 20 veterans commit suicide every day. Many don't have access to critical mental health resources they need. They’ve served us honorably and deserve for their government to step up and help them. https://t.co/G21DuHVgSw

This is how geopolitical foes like #China sneak into U.S. media and push through their propaganda and disinformation.   I applaud @AjitPaiFCC and the FCC for ensuring that Chinese-owned media companies accurately disclose their ties.  From @JerryDunleavy: https://t.co/YOfGMoaqGq

A great moment for the @FortLeonardWood community. The hospital ensures our military families have continued access to quality medical care.  Thank you for inviting me to speak at this event. It’s a great honor to represent the FLW community in the House Armed Services Committee! https://t.co/ilLRoOHxCh https://t.co/PQ1zBkhY29

Pulling school resource officers out of schools is foolish. They protect our kids from possible attacks & build positive relationships with students.  To address the REAL problems we should be looking at @SenatorTimScott and @RepPeteStauber’s #JUSTICEAct  https://t.co/pzWZjYvSX8

There IS bipartisan support in Congress for reforms to give law enforcement the tools resources and training necessary to do their jobs.  Stop using people’s lives as pawns for a political game.   @SpeakerPelosi: let’s us vote on the #JUSTICEAct this week. https://t.co/CmFIDnxXHe https://t.co/zUZrCse93C

It has been weeks since Speaker Pelosi last called the House into session. It’s disappointing given there’s so much important work to get done for the American people.  I’m glad to be back in Washington to work with my House Armed Services Committee colleagues on #NDAA

We MUST protect Title IX and protect women's sports. Already biological girls have fewer teams and fewer scholarship opportunities.   Let's eliminate discrimination against women that result from the replacement of sex categories by that of "gender identity." #SaveGirlsSports

I wish all the fathers a very happy #FathersDay! And a special shout out to my husband Lowell for being such an incredible father to our daughter Tiffany.  Proverbs 23:24: The father of a righteous child has great joy; a man who fathers a wise son rejoices in him. https://t.co/UqibzVmMfC

Today I co-sponsored the JUSTICE Act.   We must come together to forge a new path of unity and purpose for our nation by addressing every injustice while still acknowledging the positive and equitable actions carried out each day.  @RepPeteStauber @SenatorTimScott https://t.co/HxgMHxtizW

#Juneteenth is a significant day in our national history. On this day in 1865 Major General Granger declared that the Civil War was over and those enslaved were now free.  This historic day is an important milestone in ensuring that ALL Americans are equal before the law.

If we defund the police who do we call when a child has been abducted a domestic partner from beating his wife or someone breaks into our house?   Let's support the 99.9% of law enforcement who protect our communities and stop vilifying those who sacrifice to protect us!

I joined @RepGregSteube to condemn radical efforts to defund the police.  Our police needs the tools funds and resources to protect our communities and keep our families safe. Reforms are needed but defunding the police isn't it. These calls to defund the police are ludicrous.

#FlagDay is a day to recognize our national heroes and celebrate what we stand for as a country.  Our flag is such an important symbol of our foundational values representative of our everlasting quest to ensure individual freedom demand justice and instill valor. #FlagDay2020 https://t.co/i7F3WGcPfU

States re-opening is welcomed news!   As we grapple with the #coronavirus many furloughed or temporarily laid off employees are returning to work and businesses are bouncing back from this economic downturn.   Our response is working. Let's keep the momentum going. https://t.co/5TKOg9zjWz

This is GREAT news from @GovParsonMO!  These last few months have exemplified the resiliency of our people. I have absolute confidence Missourians will recover strong and I couldn’t be prouder to represent such strong and resilient individuals.  https://t.co/neBtO9YyIy
Democrats' calls to defund the police are ludicrous.  Thoughtful ways to look at reform are needed but this extremism is not. The #ThinBlueLine protects us and deserves appreciation not defunding.

America is bouncing back from this economic downturn. This is why a smart strategic phased opening of our states’ economy is incredibly vital.  These last few months have exemplified the resiliency and can-do spirit of the American people.  🛠 2.5M jobs 📉 Lowering Unemployment https://t.co/ofXW4KnXzY

It's #PTSDAwarenessMonth.  I want to highlight FBVSA the Faith Based Veterans Service Alliance offering no-cost resources for active duty veterans and family members struggling with #PTSD.   Visit https://t.co/iFFCauCjAE to learn more about their programs and resources. https://t.co/BFmyxk6cmn

David Dorn of St. Louis was an exemplary law enforcement official volunteering to keep his neighbors safe amid the protests.  Vicious criminals exploiting peaceful protests took the life of this great public servant. All responsible must be apprehended and punished.
